description: adding and removing fixed IPs do not refresh the cache for an instance and therefore do not show up in instance lists until they end up being healed by periodic task at some unknown point in the future.
title: add and remove ixed ip need the refresh_cache decorator

comments.content: adding and removing fixed IPs do not refresh the cache for an instance and therefore do not show up in instance lists until they end up being healed by periodic task at some unknown point in the future.
